divs: Sighting Detailsdid anyone report seeing a UFO Christmas day in Arvada? I went out on my kids large back back porch to have a cigarette. I was looking north and it looked like it was a mile (or less) away. There was hardly any wind - it was around 4 - 4:30 PM - and stll light outside. It was round & was hovering - it looked like something was spinning on the bottom. It was huge - about 40 feet diameter. It hovered about 5 minutes - then moved to the right (East) about 3 times its' width and turned bright red - looked like a ball of fire - fringed all around like it was burning - this lasted about one minute - then it just disappeared. I didn't call the family out to see it - they were playing with the grand kids so there were no other witnesses. Just wondered if anyone else saw it - anyway -
Summary: I saw an object hovering looked like spinning on bottom
